high_descs: Turn to the right and go to the brown chair.
Pick up the pillow that is on the brown chair.
Turn to the left and go to the wall, then turn right to face the table.
Turn on the lamp that is on the table.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pillow and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Move to the arm chair to the right of the couch
Pick up a pillow from the chair
Move to the lamp to the left of you
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pillow with a lamp.

high_descs: turn right, walk forward a few steps, turn left to face the chair
pick up the pillow that is on the chair
turn left, walk forward towards the wall, turn right to face the lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a pillow with a lamp
